name: care_heart_cohort
title: Adult Patients with Cardiology Encounters (Inpatient or Outpatient) After First Heart Failure Diagnosis
description: This cohort includes patients aged 18 years or older who have a diagnosis of heart failure and at least one cardiology-related encounter (inpatient admission or outpatient visit) occurring after their first heart failure diagnosis.

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

entry.name: patientEncounter
entry.description: Includes inpatient and outpatient hospital encounters associated with cardiology services.

eligibility.name: adultsWithHeartFailure
eligibility.description: Restricts the cohort to adult patients whose first heart failure diagnosis occurred before the encounter admission date.

criteria.name: adults
criteria.description: Include only adults patients (age is 18 or older)

criteria.name: firstHeartFailureDiagnosisBeforeAdmission
criteria.description: The patientâ€™s first heart failure diagnosis must occur before the encounter admission date.

period.description: Includes all patients for the defined cohort population.
